description: A contemporary weather app developed using React and driven by the OpenWeatherMap API. It has real-time weather updates, a 5-day forecast, and a modern, responsive design.

title: Real-Time Chat App üí¨
description: A real-time chat application built with Socket.io, Express.js, and MongoDB. Features include user authentication, group chat, private messaging, message persistence, and typing indicators.

title: ServeEase üöÄ
description: A complete service management platform developed using React.js, Node.js, and Firebase. User authentication (login/signup), service request administration (new, update, and remove requests), real-time alerts, and admin dashboards are among the available features. Integration with Stripe for payments and Firebase for real-time updates.
